Rationale.RP1_ImplementationReconstructability: The plan.md and CodeWalkthrough.md provide complete specification of the methodology: OV matrix construction from top-k heads, hidden state extraction at specified layers, and nearest-neighbor parallelogram evaluation. No major inference or guesswork required for reimplementation.
Rationale.RP2_EnvironmentReproducibility: Environment is reproducible with standard dependencies (nnsight, torch, transformers). Model (Llama-2-7b-hf) is publicly available. All data files and pre-computed head orderings are included in the repository. No version conflicts encountered.
Rationale.RP3_DeterminismAndStability: Experiment is deterministic with model inference under torch.no_grad(). Verified test case (concept lens, layer 20, capital-common-countries) produced exact match: 0.8953. No random sampling or stochastic components in the methodology.
